name: Sproingusball
description:
Sproingusball!

A fast hackysack physics platformer about keeping your ball safe.

Controls: (stated in-game as well)

A/D/Left/Right = move

Mouse = aim

W/Space/Up/Shift = jump

Left click/Right click = kick

1/2/3/Q/E/Scroll wheel = change force

Escape = last level/exit

Enter = skip level

R = restart level

Tips:

You can play through the levels without the ball for an easier, though stripped and unintended, experience.

Spam clicking can be very useful!

Walk ahead before you take the ball with you to know what the path ahead is.

Wildcards used: all of them lol

Font by David Linssen

Music by Joth
